64  void readfile(const std::string filename) {
65  std::ifstream infile;
66 
67  infile.open(filename);
68  if (!infile)
69  std::cout << "File " << filename << " not found!" << std::endl;
70 
71  int hRead = 0;
72  float coord;
73  for (int n = 0; n < N && infile; ++n) {
74  for (int i = 0; i < D; ++i) {
75  infile >> coord;
76  try {
77  points.push_back(coord);
78  } catch (const std::bad_alloc&) {
79  std::cerr << "Out of memory when reading data, exiting..."
80  << std::endl;
81  exit(1);
82  }
83  }
84  hRead++;
85  }
86  if (hRead != N)
87  std::cout << "ERROR, read less than " << N << " points!!\n\n";
88  }
89 
95  void readfile_N_D(const std::string filename) {
96  std::ifstream infile;
97 
98  infile.open(filename);
99  if (!infile)
100  std::cout << "File " << filename << " not found!" << std::endl;
101 
102  // read first line of file: D N
103  infile >> D;
104  if (D < 1) {
105  std::cout << "ERROR, dimension less than one!!\n\n";
106  return;
107  }
108  infile >> N;
109  if (N < 1) {
110  std::cout << "ERROR, number of points less than 1!!\n\n";
111  return;
112  }
113 
114  int hRead = 0;
115  float coord;
116  for (int n = 0; n < N && infile; ++n) {
117  for (int i = 0; i < D; ++i) {
118  infile >> coord;
119  try {
120  points.push_back(coord);
121  } catch (const std::bad_alloc&) {
122  std::cerr << "Out of memory when reading data, exiting..."
123  << std::endl;
124  exit(1);
125  }
126  }
127  hRead++;
128  }
129  if (hRead != N)
130  std::cout << "ERROR, read less than " << N << " points!!\n\n";
131  }

133 #ifdef RKD_PAR
134 
147  void populate(std::vector<RKD < Division_Euclidean_space<T> > >* roots, const int from,
148  const int to, const size_t N, const size_t D, size_t* split_dims,
149  int t, bool shuffle_enable, Rotation rotate_option) {
150  //std::cout << "from = " << from << ", to = " << to << std::endl;
151  try {
152  if(shuffle_enable)
153  std::srand(std::time(0));
154  for(int i = from; i < to; ++i) {
155  std::vector<size_t> indices(N);
156  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
157  indices[i] = i;
158  }
159  if(shuffle_enable)
160  std::random_shuffle(indices.begin(), indices.end());
161  (*roots)[i].build(0, indices.begin(), indices.end(), split_dims, t, D);
162  if(rotate_option == Householder)
163  (*roots)[i].discard_rot_p(&points);
164  }
165  }
166  catch (const std::bad_alloc&) {
167  std::cout << "[exception caught when constructing tree]\n";
168  return;
169  }
170  }
171 #endif
172 
207  void search_nn_prune(const std::vector<T>& q,
208  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> >& res,
209  int max_leaf_check, const std::vector<T>& squared_coords,
210  const std::vector<T>& q_squared_coords, int q_index,
211  bool sorted_results = false, int k = 1, float epsilon =
212  0.0) {
213 
214  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
215  size_t max_count = max_leaf_check * mul_factor;
216  res.resize(k, { std::numeric_limits<float>::max(), -1 });
217  std::make_heap(res.begin(), res.end());
218  Min_heap branch;
219  size_t vis[N];
220  memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis));
221  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
222  roots[i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res, branch, 0, 0, i,
223  vis, squared_coords, q_squared_coords, q_index);
224  }
225  //std::cout << "Heap.size " << branch.size() << " \n";
226  size_t c = 0;
227  size_t node_i, tree_i;
228  float new_mindist;
229 
230  while (branch.size() && c++ < max_count) {
231  std::tie(new_mindist, node_i, tree_i) = branch.top();
232  branch.pop();
233  //std::cout << new_mindist << std::endl;
234  roots[tree_i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res, branch,
235  new_mindist, node_i, tree_i, vis, squared_coords,
236  q_squared_coords, q_index);
237  }
238  //std::cout << "Checked " << c << " branches\n";
239  //std::cout << "End Heap.size " << branch.size() << " \n";
240  if (sorted_results)
241  std::sort_heap(res.begin(), res.end());
242  }
243 
244  public:
263  Auto_random_kd_forest(
264  size_t& N, size_t& D, const std::string& datafile, const size_t Q,
265  const std::string& queryfile, const int k, const float epsilon,
266  std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > >& results,
267  Params* parameters = 0,
268  const int file_option = 0)
269  : N(N),
270  D(D) {
271  // read the data set
272  if (file_option == 0) {
273  readfile(datafile);
274  } else if (file_option == 1) {
275  readfile_N_D(datafile);
276  }
277  assert(Auto_random_kd_forest::N > 0);
278  assert(Auto_random_kd_forest::D > 0);
279  N = Auto_random_kd_forest::N;
280  D = Auto_random_kd_forest::D;
281 
282  float var[D];
283  int points_per_leaf, trees_no, t, max_leaf_check;
284  size_t sample_size;
285  Rotation rotate_option;
286  bool shuffle_enable;
287  if(parameters) {
288  assign(*parameters, points_per_leaf, trees_no, t, max_leaf_check,
289  rotate_option, shuffle_enable, sample_size);
290  compute_variances<T>(points, N, D, var, parameters->sample_size);
291  } else {
292  // variance is computed inside that function too
293  auto_config_params(epsilon, var, points_per_leaf, trees_no,
294  t, max_leaf_check, rotate_option, shuffle_enable);
295  }
296 
297  // build the forest
298  size_t split_dims[t];
299  kthLargest(var, D, t, split_dims);
300  /***** Compute number of leaves, nodes and maximum number of points per leaf.*****/
301  size_t leaves = (N / points_per_leaf) + !!(N % points_per_leaf); // Add one if nonzero remainder
302  // If 'leaves' is a power of two, (leaves & (leaves - 1)) is zero.
303  if (leaves & (leaves - 1)) {
304  // Not a power of two. Round up.
305  size_t old;
306 
307  // Fill all low bits
308  do {
309  old = leaves;
310  leaves |= leaves >> 1;
311  } while (old != leaves);
312 
313  // Add one
314  leaves++;
315  }
316 
317  size_t nmax = N / leaves + !!(N % leaves); // +1 if remainder nonzero
318 
319  // There are one less nodes than (the power of two) number of leaves
320  size_t nodes = leaves - 1;
321  /************************** Done *****************************************/
322 #ifdef RKD_PAR
323  if(rotate_option == Householder) {
324  std::vector<T> rot_points[trees_no];
325  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
326  // 'rot_points' has the scope of the for loop, watch out!
327  // vector used by rotation process
328  std::vector<float> v;
329  rotate(N, D, rot_points[i], points, v);
330  roots.push_back(RKD< Division_Euclidean_space<T> >(&rot_points[i], D, nodes, leaves, nmax, &v));
331  }
332  int p;
333 #if __GNUC__ >= 5 || __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 8
334  const int P = std::thread::hardware_concurrency();
335  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
336 #else
337  const int P = my_hardware_concurrency();
338  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
339 #endif
340  if(p <= 0) {
341  std::cout << "ERROR: 'p' <= 0.\n";
342  return;
343  }
344  const int chunk = trees_no / p;
345 
346  //std::cout << "chunk = " << chunk << ", trees_no = " << trees_no << ", p = " << p <<std::endl;
347 
348  std::thread threads[p];
349  // spawn 'p' threads:
350  threads[p - 1] = std::thread(&Auto_random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, (p - 1) * chunk, trees_no,
351  N, D, &split_dims[0], t, shuffle_enable, rotate_option);
352  for (int i = 0; i < p - 1; ++i)
353  threads[i] = std::thread(&Auto_random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, i * chunk, (i + 1) * chunk,
354  N, D, &split_dims[0], t, shuffle_enable, rotate_option);
355  for (int i = 0; i < p; ++i)
356  threads[i].join();
357  } else {
358  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
359  roots.push_back(RKD< Division_Euclidean_space<T> >(&points, D, nodes, leaves, nmax));
360  }
361  int p;
362 #if __GNUC__ >= 5 || __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 8
363  const int P = std::thread::hardware_concurrency();
364  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
365 #else
366  const int P = my_hardware_concurrency();
367  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
368 #endif
369  if(p <= 0) {
370  std::cout << "ERROR: 'p' <= 0.\n";
371  return;
372  }
373  const int chunk = trees_no / p;
374 
375  //std::cout << "chunk = " << chunk << ", trees_no = " << trees_no << ", p = " << p <<std::endl;
376 
377  std::thread threads[p];
378  // spawn 'p' threads:
379  threads[p - 1] = std::thread(&Auto_random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, (p - 1) * chunk, trees_no,
380  N, D, &split_dims[0], t, shuffle_enable, rotate_option);
381  for (int i = 0; i < p - 1; ++i)
382  threads[i] = std::thread(&Auto_random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, i * chunk, (i + 1) * chunk,
383  N, D, &split_dims[0], t, shuffle_enable, rotate_option);
384  for (int i = 0; i < p; ++i)
385  threads[i].join();
386  }
387 #else // serial construction of trees
388  if (shuffle_enable)
389  std::srand(std::time(0));
390  if (rotate_option == Householder) {
391  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
392  std::vector<T> rot_points;
393  // vector used by rotation process
394  std::vector<float> v;
395  rotate(N, D, rot_points, points, v);
396  roots.push_back(
397  RKD<Division_Euclidean_space<T> >(&rot_points, D, nodes, leaves,
398  nmax, &v));
399  std::vector<size_t> indices(N);
400  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
401  indices[i] = i;
402  }
403  if (shuffle_enable)
404  std::random_shuffle(indices.begin(), indices.end());
405  roots[i].build(0, indices.begin(), indices.end(), split_dims, t, D);
406  roots[i].discard_rot_p(&points);
407  }
408  } else {
409  std::cout << "Done" << std::endl;
410  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
411  roots.push_back(
412  RKD<Division_Euclidean_space<T> >(&points, D, nodes, leaves, nmax));
413  std::vector<size_t> indices(N);
414  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
415  indices[i] = i;
416  }
417  if (shuffle_enable)
418  std::random_shuffle(indices.begin(), indices.end());
419  roots[i].build(0, indices.begin(), indices.end(), split_dims, t, D);
420  }
421  }
422 #endif
423  std::vector<T> squared_coords;
424  computeSquare(points, N, D, squared_coords);
425 
426  std::cout << "N = " << N << ", D = " << D << std::endl;
427  std::cout << "points_per_leaf = " << points_per_leaf << "\n";
428  std::cout << "trees_no = " << trees_no << "\n";
429  std::cout << "t = " << t << "\n";
430  std::cout << "rotate_option = " << rotate_option << "\n";
431  std::cout << "max_leaf_check = " << max_leaf_check << "\n";
432  std::cout << std::endl;
433 
434  // read the queries
435  std::vector<std::vector<T> > q;
436  read_points<T>(q, Q, D, queryfile.c_str());
437 
438  // perform the search
439  results.resize(Q);
440  std::vector<T> q_squared_coords;
441  computeSquare(q, Q, D, q_squared_coords);
442  for (int i = 0; i < Q; ++i) {
443  search_nn_prune(q[i], results[i], max_leaf_check, squared_coords,
444  q_squared_coords, i, false, k, epsilon);
445  }
446  }
447 
461  void check_miss(
462  const std::string& matchfile, const size_t Q, const int k,
463  const std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > >& results) {
464  std::vector<std::vector<int> > match;
465  read_indices(match, Q, k, matchfile.c_str());
466  int miss = 0;
467  bool found;
468  for (int i = 0; i < Q; ++i) {
469  found = false;
470  for (std::vector<std::pair<float, int> >::const_iterator it = results[i]
471  .begin(); it != results[i].end(); ++it) {
472  //std::cout << match[i][0] <<", sam: " << it->second << "\n";
473  if (match[i][0] == it->second) { // || match[i][1] == it->second) {
474  found = true;
475  }
476  //else std::cout << "query = " << i << ", " << match[i][0] <<", " << match[i][1] << " , sam: " << it->second << "\n";
477  }
478  if (!found) {
479  ++miss;
480  }
481  // std::cout << it->first << ", index = " << it->second << std::endl;
482  }
483 
484  std::cout << "miss = " << miss << std::endl;
485  std::cout << "Miss: " << ((miss * 100) / (double) Q) << "%\n";
486  }

493  void print(const std::vector<T>& p) {
494  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i)
495  std::cout << p[i] << "\n";
496  }

505  void print_trees(bool points = false) {
506  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
507  roots[i].printNodes();
508  if (points)
509  roots[i].printLeavesPoints();
510  else
511  roots[i].printLeaves();
512  }
513  }

515  private:
516  void auto_config_params(const float epsilon, float* var, int& points_per_leaf, int &trees_no,
517  int& t, int& max_leaf_check, Rotation& rotate_option,
518  bool& shuffle_enable) {
519  compute_variances<T>(points, N, D, var, N);
520  /* In probability theory and statistics, variance measures
521  how far a set of numbers is spread out. A variance of
522  zero indicates that all the values are identical. So, we
523  check the first 5 variances and take their mean. If it is
524  less than 1000, we choose different parameters than in the
525  case that the mean is greater than 1000.
526  */
527  float mean_var = .0;
528  for (int i = 0; i < 5 && i < D; ++i)
529  mean_var += var[i];
530  mean_var /= 5.0;
531  //std::cout << "mean_var = " << mean_var << std::endl;
532 
533  // this should be updated with the automatic routine,
534  // now hardcoded for simplicity
535  if (D < 120) {
536  if (N < 50000) {
537  // should be updated
538  if (mean_var <= 1000.0) { //sphere-like
539  points_per_leaf = 128;
540  trees_no = 128;
541  t = 64;
542  rotate_option = No;
543  shuffle_enable = false;
544  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
545  max_leaf_check = 128;
546  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
547  max_leaf_check = 32;
548  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
549  max_leaf_check = 16;
550  } else {
551  max_leaf_check = 1;
552  }
553  } else { // mean of variance greater than 1000
554  //3228.14 (N = 10^4)
555  max_leaf_check = 1;
556  trees_no = 64;
557  t = 3; //128
558  rotate_option = No;
559  shuffle_enable = false;
560  // something is wrong, the algo is not
561  // entering the right epsilon
562  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
563  points_per_leaf = 64;
564  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
565  points_per_leaf = 64;
566  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
567  points_per_leaf = 32;
568  } else {
569  points_per_leaf = 16;
570  }
571  points_per_leaf = 1;
572  }
573  } else { // N >= 50000 && D < 120
574  points_per_leaf = 32;
575  trees_no = 1024;
576  t = 5; //16
577  rotate_option = No;
578  shuffle_enable = false; //true
579  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
580  max_leaf_check = 32;
581  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
582  max_leaf_check = 16;
583  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
584  max_leaf_check = 4;
585  } else {
586  max_leaf_check = 1;
587  }
588  }
589  } else if (D < 900) { // D >= 120 && D < 900
590  // should be updated with mean variance
591  // in order to pick parameters
592  if (N < 100000) {
593  points_per_leaf = 64;
594  trees_no = 11;
595  t = 64;
596  rotate_option = No;
597  shuffle_enable = false;
598  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
599  max_leaf_check = 40;
600  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
601  max_leaf_check = 40;
602  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
603  max_leaf_check = 4;
604  } else {
605  max_leaf_check = 1;
606  }
607  } else { // N >= 100000
608  points_per_leaf = 64;
609  trees_no = 128;
610  t = 64;
611  rotate_option = No;
612  shuffle_enable = true;
613  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
614  max_leaf_check = 1000;
615  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
616  max_leaf_check = 1000;
617  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
618  max_leaf_check = 512;
619  } else {
620  max_leaf_check = 32;
621  }
622  }
623  } else if (D < 5000) { // D > 900 && D < 5000
624  // should be updated with mean variance
625  // in order to pick parameters
626  if (N < 100000) {
627  points_per_leaf = 64;
628  trees_no = 2048;
629  t = 128;
630  rotate_option = No;
631  shuffle_enable = true;
632  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
633  max_leaf_check = 128;
634  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
635  max_leaf_check = 128;
636  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
637  points_per_leaf = 32;
638  max_leaf_check = 32;
639  } else {
640  points_per_leaf = 8; //16
641  max_leaf_check = 1;
642  }
643  } else {
644  points_per_leaf = 1024;
645  trees_no = 256;
646  t = 128;
647  rotate_option = No;
648  shuffle_enable = true;
649  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
650  max_leaf_check = 128;
651  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
652  max_leaf_check = 64;
653  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
654  points_per_leaf = 512;
655  max_leaf_check = 32;
656  } else {
657  points_per_leaf = 256;
658  max_leaf_check = 16;
659  }
660  }
661  if (D == 1000) {
662  if (N == 1000) {
663  if (mean_var > 200) {
664  // klein
665  points_per_leaf = 8;
666  trees_no = 3;
667  t = 3; //128;
668  rotate_option = No;
669  shuffle_enable = true;
670  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
671  max_leaf_check = 1;
672  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
673  max_leaf_check = 1;
674  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
675  points_per_leaf = 6;
676  max_leaf_check = 1;
677  } else {
678  points_per_leaf = 4;
679  max_leaf_check = 1;
680  }
681  } else {
682  points_per_leaf = 8;
683  trees_no = 64;
684  t = 8;
685  rotate_option = No;
686  shuffle_enable = true;
687  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
688  max_leaf_check = 128;
689  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
690  max_leaf_check = 128;
691  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
692  points_per_leaf = 6;
693  max_leaf_check = 64;
694  } else {
695  points_per_leaf = 4;
696  max_leaf_check = 1;
697  }
698  }
699  }
700  if (N == 10000) {
701  if (mean_var > 2000) {
702  // klein
703  points_per_leaf = 4;
704  trees_no = 256; //3;
705  t = 3;
706  rotate_option = No;
707  shuffle_enable = true;
708  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
709  max_leaf_check = 1;
710  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
711  max_leaf_check = 1;
712  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
713  points_per_leaf = 6;
714  max_leaf_check = 1;
715  } else {
716  points_per_leaf = 4;
717  max_leaf_check = 1;
718  }
719  } else {
720  points_per_leaf = 16;
721  trees_no = 1024;
722  t = 16;
723  rotate_option = No;
724  shuffle_enable = true;
725  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
726  max_leaf_check = 1;
727  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
728  points_per_leaf = 4;
729  max_leaf_check = 1;
730  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
731  points_per_leaf = 2;
732  max_leaf_check = 1;
733  } else {
734  points_per_leaf = 1;
735  max_leaf_check = 1;
736  }
737  }
738  }
739  if (N == 100000) { //1865.42
740  if (mean_var > 1500) {
741  // klein
742  points_per_leaf = 64;
743  trees_no = 1024; //3;
744  t = 3;
745  rotate_option = No;
746  shuffle_enable = true;
747  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
748  max_leaf_check = 128;
749  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
750  max_leaf_check = 64;
751  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
752  points_per_leaf = 32;
753  max_leaf_check = 64;
754  } else {
755  points_per_leaf = 16;
756  max_leaf_check = 32;
757  }
758  } else { //mean_var = 0.376393
759  points_per_leaf = 64;
760  trees_no = 1024;
761  t = 256;
762  rotate_option = No;
763  shuffle_enable = true;
764  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
765  max_leaf_check = 128;
766  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
767  points_per_leaf = 32;
768  max_leaf_check = 64;
769  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
770  points_per_leaf = 16;
771  max_leaf_check = 32;
772  } else {
773  points_per_leaf = 4;
774  max_leaf_check = 16;
775  }
776  }
777  }
778  }
779  } else { // D > 5000
780  // should be updated with mean variance
781  // in order to pick parameters
782  points_per_leaf = 4;
783  trees_no = 10;
784  t = 7;
785  rotate_option = No;
786  shuffle_enable = false;
787  if (epsilon == 0.0) {
788  max_leaf_check = 2;
789  } else if (epsilon <= 0.1) {
790  max_leaf_check = 2;
791  } else if (epsilon <= 0.5) {
792  points_per_leaf = 2;
793  max_leaf_check = 1;
794  } else {
795  points_per_leaf = 1;
796  max_leaf_check = 1;
797  }
798  }
799  }
800 
804  std::vector<RKD<Division_Euclidean_space<T> > > roots;
808  size_t N;
812  size_t D;
817  std::vector<T> points;
818 
819 };
820 #endif /*AUTO_RANDOM_KD_TREE_H*/
